entities.name: katie bell
entities.description: Katie Bell is mentioned as a member of the original Gryffindor Quidditch team that Harry joined in his first year.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as having joined the Gryffindor Quidditch team in his first year and has been watching Katie Bell play for five years.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as looking uncomfortable when Katie Bell warns Harry about not letting friends join the team.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione's Fanged Frisbee is used by Ron in the common room.

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: Crookshanks is mentioned as watching the Fanged Frisbee and hissing when it comes too close.

entities.name: gryffindor quidditch team
entities.description: The Gryffindor Quidditch team is mentioned as having original members including Katie Bell.

relationships.description: Katie Bell is a member of the Gryffindor Quidditch team that Harry joined in his first year.
Harry has been watching Katie Bell play for five years.
Ron is using Hermione's Fanged Frisbee in the common room.
Crookshanks is reacting to the Fanged Frisbee by hissing when it comes too close.
